1.review_notes:
Post-Incident Review - INC0000001

Attendees: Incident Manager, Technical Leads, Account Manager, 5 team members
Duration: 73 minutes

Timeline Review:
- Detection: 2025-10-04T07:50
- Acknowledged: 2025-10-04T10:26
- Resolved: N/A
- Total Duration: 47 hours

Key Discussion Points:
1. Initial response effectiveness
2. Communication clarity during incident
3. Escalation procedures followed
4. Technical resolution approach
5. Customer impact mitigation

Team Performance: Good response time
1.lessons_learned:
• Documentation was incomplete. Need better real-time documentation.
• Early detection systems proved effective. User reports identified the issue within 27 minutes.
• Escalation to executive level could have been faster. Consider lowering escalation thresholds for P3 incidents.
• Communication protocols worked well. Status updates were provided every 57 minutes to stakeholders.
• Root cause analysis completed within SLA. System diagnostics identified the underlying issue.
• Root cause analysis completed within SLA. System diagnostics identified the underlying issue.
1.action_items:
1. Conduct training session on bridge call protocols - Assigned to: Training Team - Due: 39 days
2. Schedule vendor review meeting to discuss SLA compliance - Assigned to: Vendor Manager - Due: 12 days
3. Schedule vendor review meeting to discuss SLA compliance - Assigned to: Vendor Manager - Due: 12 days
4. Update runbook for service restart procedures - Assigned to: Tech Lead - Due: 27 days
5. Update disaster recovery documentation - Assigned to: Architecture Team - Due: 70 days
